pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network Applications to Facial Communication Data // Functions to analyze and visualize communication data, based on network theory and resampling methods. Farine, D. R. (2017) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12772; Carsey, T., Harden, J. (2014) doi:10.4135/9781483319605. Primarily targeted at datasets of facial expressions coded with the Facial Action Coding System. Ekman, P., Friesen, W. V., Hager, J. C. (2002). "Facial action coding system - investigator's guide" https://www.paulekman.com/facial-action-coding-system/.
